txt.en: You have reached level 20 and now have the ability to ride a basic steed.  You should seek out the horse-master of Hengstacer in the Bree-land if you wish to buy your Starter Bree-horse/pony. \n\nAfter you purchase a mount you may want to map the action of summoning it to a key. There's a Keyboard Shortcut called Dismount/Remount located in Options -> Key Mapping. This shortcut will dismount any mount you might be riding. It also remembers the last mount that you successfully used and will remount it if used when not already mounted.

It also remembers the last mount that you successfully used and will remount it if used when not already mounted.
